name: Balthazar Vs The Brain Eaters
description:
A Xornglorph and Higgins Industrial Logistics ultra heavy space freighter carrying a shipment of fishfood in the orbit of Vorgix IV has been captured by brain eating cyber pirates from the planet Zorppon III! 

Much of the crew have sadly had their brains consumed by the cyber pirates. 

However, never fear shareholders, the executives of Xornglorph and Higgins Industrial Logistics have dispatched only the most experienced available mercenary in brain eating cyber pirate removal to the freighter to protect our profit margins. None other than the famed bounty hunter Balthazar Boovlezoid. 

A combination of boomer shooter FPS and Bullet hell Top Down Shooting.

One side of your screen is connected to a drone that displays a top down view the other side displays a FPS perspective.

Also you play as a brain in a jar connected to a robotic suit and you put fish food in your brain container to heal yourself.... just thought you should know that.

Controls: 

WASD – Move 

Mouse – Turn 

Left Click – Fire Left Weapon 

Right Click – Fire Right Weapon 

Shift – Sprint  

1 – Select Laser Pistols  

2 – Select Shotgun  

3 – Select Assault Rifle 

H – Heal 

R – Restart Level  

Esc – Return to main menu
